type.description:
## In Snow

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/in_snow)

Checks if it's snowing at the entity's position.

Type ID: `origins:in_snow`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:in_snow"
}
```
